entry.data:
SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 40
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
